title: Fragments, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal
Technique: Combination of two stuctures: 4 harness irregular twill [foundation] plus 3/1 twill \ [supplementary facing and pattern].  Foundation fabric has an integrated set of supplementary wefts free floating on the front to patte
description: Fragments cut from a continuous pattern of gold or silver diamond-shaped floral forms set in a loose diamond lattice made of green, salmon, and ivory blossoms.  The background would have been gold or silver.  Each fragment has one selvage intact.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 17th century. Medium: silk and metal
Technique: Combination of two stuctures: 4 harness irregular twill [foundation] plus 3/1 twill \ [supplementary facing and pattern].  Foundation fabric has an integrated set of supplementary wefts free floating on the front to patte. 1972-24-2-a/d.
